data.text: @GBirgand @CAMO_Imperial We hope your cards start working again soon and that you had a great first day back, Gabriel! 💙
@GBirgand Thank you for coming over! https://t.co/sTwvJtT6ir
And cherry on the top, spent the all day with @castrocloud playing Virtual Reality with students to prevent surgical site infections

My experience today after 2 years without coming @imperialcollege:
(I) my cards are not working anymore. No access without the help of the wonderful Rakhee; (II) the office is not at the same place. Now situated @CAMO_Imperial. Much better indeed. nice to be back with colleagues
@GBirgand @imperialcollege @HPRUamr The great ICL, where freshers are still sitting in their rooms watching last yearâ€™s recorded lectures.
